alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 19 at 8:46PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A FLOOD WATCH IS IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDSAY... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms associated with Tropical low 91P is possible. WHERE...Tutuila & Manu`a WHEN...Through Thursday IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause flooding on roadways and properties and overflowing of streams. Landslides are also possible. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Thunderstorms associated with Tropical low 91P south of Tutuila, will possibly produce flash flooding conditions for the territory as it lingers near. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 842 Po Aso Lulu Ianuari 19 2022 ...UA IAI LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE ASO TOFI... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e ono mafua mai i le tetele o timuga mai Taaviliga o Savili 91P i saute o le Atunu`u. NOFOAGA...Tutuila ma Manu`a TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Tofi. AAFIAGA...O le tetele o timuga e ono mafua ai lologa ma tafega, faapea sologa. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O Taaviliga o Savili 91P i saute o Tutuila o le a mafua ai ona faatupulaia ai faititili ma lologa ma tafega a o lata mai nei uiga louloua o le tau. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
